summary: Documentary about Tommy Chong's federal prosecution under the Bush administration for selling bongs over the Internet.

Bush|Alan Dershowitz|Josh Gilbert|Richard Nixon|Nancy Reagan|Ronald Reagan|Geraldo Rivera|Arnold Schwarzenegger
keywords: tommy chong|george bush|reference to jesus christ|marijuana|bill maher
title: A/k/a Tommy Chong
